title: Only champs
body: Riot wtf i cant believe last 10 crates i opened i only got champions not single skin, ward skin or summoner icon . Even from fucking Honor capsule i opened fucking champion i m fucking sick of that shit !

replies.body: I'm not actually seeing anywhere that *this* account has opened Hextech Chests. It looks like you've been buying and using mostly Hextech Mystery Champion Shards from the shop and not actual Hextech Chests. Those Champion Shard tokens are meant, and will always, give you a random champion shard as they're meant to.
